record_error:
不允许访问"项目合同"（construction.contract）记录。

允许对以下组进行此操作：
	- Smart Construction/SC 能力 - 合同中心只读
	- Smart Construction/SC 能力 - 合同中心审批
	- Smart Construction/SC 能力 - 合同中心经办
	- Smart Construction/SC 能力 - 财务中心只读
	- Smart Construction/SC 能力 - 财务中心审批
	- Smart Construction/SC 能力 - 财务中心经办
	- Smart Construction/合同中心-只读
	- Smart Construction/合同中心-审批
	- Smart Construction/合同中心-经办

如有必要，请联系您的管理员申请访问权限。

meta_fields.name: access_url
meta_fields.help: Customer Portal URL

meta_fields.name: active
meta_fields.help: If the active field is set to False, it will allow you to hide the project without removing it.

meta_fields.name: activity_exception_decoration
meta_fields.help: Type of the exception activity on record.

meta_fields.name: activity_exception_icon
meta_fields.help: Icon to indicate an exception activity.

meta_fields.name: activity_state
meta_fields.help:
Status based on activities
Overdue: Due date is already passed
Today: Activity date is today
Planned: Future activities.

meta_fields.name: activity_type_icon
meta_fields.help: Font awesome icon e.g. fa-tasks

meta_fields.name: actual_percent
meta_fields.help: 结合工程量计量或节点验收计算出的真实进度。

meta_fields.name: alias_bounced_content
meta_fields.help: If set, this content will automatically be sent out to unauthorized users instead of the default message.

meta_fields.name: alias_contact
meta_fields.help:
Policy to post a message on the document using the mailgateway.
- everyone: everyone can post
- partners: only authenticated partners
- followers: only followers of the related document or members of following channels

meta_fields.name: alias_defaults
meta_fields.help: A Python dictionary that will be evaluated to provide default values when creating new records for this alias.

meta_fields.name: alias_domain
meta_fields.help: Email domain e.g. 'example.com' in 'odoo@example.com'

meta_fields.name: alias_force_thread_id
meta_fields.help: Optional ID of a thread (record) to which all incoming messages will be attached, even if they did not reply to it. If set, this will disable the creation of new records completely.

meta_fields.name: alias_id
meta_fields.help: Internal email associated with this project. Incoming emails are automatically synchronized with Tasks (or optionally Issues if the Issue Tracker module is installed).

meta_fields.name: alias_model_id
meta_fields.help: The model (Odoo Document Kind) to which this alias corresponds. Any incoming email that does not reply to an existing record will cause the creation of a new record of this model (e.g. a Project Task)

meta_fields.name: alias_name
meta_fields.help: The name of the email alias, e.g. 'jobs' if you want to catch emails for <jobs@example.odoo.com>

meta_fields.name: alias_parent_model_id
meta_fields.help: Parent model holding the alias. The model holding the alias reference is not necessarily the model given by alias_model_id (example: project (parent_model) and task (model))

meta_fields.name: alias_parent_thread_id
meta_fields.help: ID of the parent record holding the alias (example: project holding the task creation alias)

meta_fields.name: alias_status
meta_fields.help: Alias status assessed on the last message received.

meta_fields.name: analytic_account_id
meta_fields.domain: (company_id and ['|', ('company_id', '=', False), ('company_id', 'parent_of', [company_id])] or ['|', ('company_id', '=', False), ('company_id', 'parent_of', [''])]) + (['|', ('company_id', '=', False), ('company_id', '=?', company_id)])
meta_fields.help:
Analytic account to which this project, its tasks and its timesheets are linked. 
Track the costs and revenues of your project by setting this analytic account on your related documents (e.g. sales orders, invoices, purchase orders, vendor bills, expenses etc.).
This analytic account can be changed on each task individually if necessary.
An analytic account is required in order to use timesheets.

meta_fields.name: budget_total
meta_fields.help: 项目立项时确定的目标成本总额。

meta_fields.name: cost_actual
meta_fields.help: 已实际记账的成本。

meta_fields.name: cost_budget_gap
meta_fields.help: 当前预算成本与台账实际成本之间的差值。

meta_fields.name: cost_committed
meta_fields.help: 已通过合同/订单等形式锁定的成本。

meta_fields.name: date
meta_fields.help: Date on which this project ends. The timeframe defined on the project is taken into account when viewing its planning.

meta_fields.name: description
meta_fields.help: Description to provide more information and context about this project

meta_fields.name: funding_enabled
meta_fields.help: 用于控制项目是否具备资金承载资格的最小语义。

meta_fields.name: label_tasks
meta_fields.help: Name used to refer to the tasks of your project e.g. tasks, tickets, sprints, etc...

meta_fields.name: lifecycle_state
meta_fields.help: 驱动项目级联动控制：暂停/关闭禁止新增进度、成本等业务数据；结算中限制部分操作。

meta_fields.name: message_has_error
meta_fields.help: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.

meta_fields.name: message_has_error_counter
meta_fields.help: Number of messages with delivery error

meta_fields.name: message_has_sms_error
meta_fields.help: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.

meta_fields.name: message_needaction
meta_fields.help: If checked, new messages require your attention.

meta_fields.name: message_needaction_counter
meta_fields.help: Number of messages requiring action

meta_fields.name: phase_key
meta_fields.help: 用于对齐 WBS / 财务节点的阶段标识，可结合审批流与报表过滤使用。

meta_fields.name: plan_percent
meta_fields.help: 结合工期或产值计划给出的阶段性目标完成率。

meta_fields.name: privacy_visibility
selection: Invited portal users and all internal users (public)
meta_fields.help:
People to whom this project and its tasks will be visible.

- Invited internal users: when following a project, internal users will get access to all of its tasks without distinction. Otherwise, they will only get access to the specific tasks they are following.
 A user with the project > administrator access right level can still access this project and its tasks, even if they are not explicitly part of the followers.

- All internal users: all internal users can access the project and all of its tasks without distinction.

- Invited portal users and all internal users: all internal users can access the project and all of its tasks without distinction.
When following a project, portal users will get access to all of its tasks without distinction. Otherwise, they will only get access to the specific tasks they are following.

When a project is shared in read-only, the portal user is redirected to their portal. They can view the tasks, but not edit them.
When a project is shared in edit, the portal user is redirected to the kanban and list views of the tasks. They can modify a selected number of fields on the tasks.

In any case, an internal user with no project access rights can still access a task, provided that they are given the corresponding URL (and that they are part of the followers if the project is private).

meta_fields.name: progress_rate_latest
meta_fields.help: 取项目进度计量记录中最新/最大完成率。

meta_fields.name: rating_percentage_satisfaction
meta_fields.help: Percentage of happy ratings

meta_fields.name: rating_status
meta_fields.help:
Collect feedback from your customers by sending them a rating request when a task enters a certain stage. To do so, define a rating email template on the corresponding stages.
Rating when changing stage: an email will be automatically sent when the task reaches the stage on which the rating email template is set.
Periodic rating: an email will be automatically sent at regular intervals as long as the task remains in the stage in which the rating email template is set.

meta_fields.name: sc_demo_showcase
meta_fields.help: 用于标记演示项目池的入口筛选项目。

meta_fields.name: sc_demo_showcase_ready
meta_fields.help: 用于演示入口硬筛选，仅展示数据补齐完成的项目。

meta_fields.name: schedule_delta
meta_fields.help: 实际完成率 - 计划完成率，负数表示落后。

meta_fields.name: website_message_ids
meta_fields.help: Website communication history
